response.original_title: Red Til I'm Dead: Sammy Hagar's Rock-N-Roll Birthday Bash
response.overview: Live music from the Cabo Wabo Cantina with a variety of special guests. 70th birthday wishes from many friends and family between songs. A little documentary and insight into the craziest birthday party tradition!
response.title: Red Til I'm Dead: Sammy Hagar's Rock-N-Roll Birthday Bash

titles.title: RED TILL I'M DEAD: SAMMY HAGAR'S BIRTHDAY BASH
